CustomField.formula: Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.Nokia_Selected_Portfolio__c + IF( CONTAINS(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.Nokia_Selected_Portfolio__c, "Fixed Access - POL") , "Access Network,FN Configurable Products,", "")+IF( CONTAINS(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.Nokia_Selected_Portfolio__c, "IP Routing") , "IPR Configurable Products,", "")
CustomField.label: Nokia Portfolio From Account
